artist: Manufacturer: International Service Company, Cleveland, Ohio
description: metal facsimile of Plymouth Rock with silver metallic base; "1620" in black on the top front; coin slot on back of base with "Plymouth Rock The Cornerstone Of A Nation" above slot; "On This Rock I Will Build My Fortune" below the slot
inscription:
Inscription

stamped onto bottom: [207/ MFG. BY/ THE INTERNATIONAL SERVICE CO./ CLEVELAND O./ PAT. NOV. 22, 1921]
title: "Plymouth Rock" still bank
